## LdmlKeyboardCompiler.validate() method

Validates that the LDML keyboard source file and lints. Actually just compiles the keyboard and returns `true` if everything is good...

**Signature:**

```typescript
validate(source: LDMLKeyboardXMLSourceFile): Promise<boolean>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  source | LDMLKeyboardXMLSourceFile |  |

**Returns:**
